title: Mountain Climbing Challenge!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Umi! Lanzhu wants to go mountain climbing with you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh? Have you taken up mountain climbing as a hobby, Lanzhu?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Not exactly. But Emma told me it was fun, so I thought it would be great to go with you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Emma... told you it was fun...... But, Lanzhu, climbing with me might be a huge hurdle. Are you sure you want to go together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu loves overcoming hurdles! I accept this challenge!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I-I’ll be counting on you then! Alright. I’m going to plan a challenging course that’s suitable for beginners!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaah! Awesome, awesome! Lanzhu is fired up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You’re going to study the gear and equipment we need to use, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Leave it to me! I’m going to climb all the mountains!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>La-Lanzhu......!! I think you’re going to be the perfect climbing partner!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
